description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 2/26/2007

Ridge tells Taylor that Rick and Phoebe kissed but they have now ended their relationship. Taylor is skeptical about their relationship really being over. Taylor admits her feelings for Nick to Ridge. Brooke arrives at Jackie M to talk to Nick about their divorce. They soon find themselves on the subject of Rick and Phoebe. Nick thinks Brooke is being manipulated by Ridge which makes Brooke regret bringing it up and then leaves. Eric surveys the new boutique and likes what he sees but he is still having doubts about opening their own chain. Stephanie is frustrated with Eric’s lack of confidence. Ridge wants to use his wedding to Brooke as a publicity stunt for their grand opening. Brooke isn’t happy with the plan. Phoebe is having trouble performing in her photo shoot until Rick arrives and gives her inspiration. Rick and Phoebe agree to keep their relationship a secret until after Ridge and Brooke are married.
